website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option, but with considerably fewer features than its counterparts.
pros: Saves water by automatically adjusting to weather and seasonal fluctuations
Uses the same wires as standard timers for hassle-free installation
Versatile 3-way timer control via Wi-Fi, mobile device or directly on control panel
cons: Manual watering feature only works one zone at a time, requiring a manual startup for each consecutive zone

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty straight forward though to hook up
customer_reviews.text: It came about 3 days early. The instructions are in Spanish. Not sure if they have English instructions or not but they didnt come with any. A little google search and I found them in PDF format. It is pretty straight forward though to hook up. The only part you really need instructions for is the wifi hook up. BTW it will ONLY run on 2.4 ghz. It will not connect to your home wifi if you are running 5 GHZ. Also I found when setting up I had to turn off my cellular data connection to get the wifi to work on the controller. Also there is no back light on the display.It's 2017 right? Over all its ok.
customer_reviews.author: stang7043

customer_reviews.title: Full of great features, Wi-Fi a must and easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a similar builder standard model (Rainbird) with this one capable of using Wi-Fi. Took a picture of my wires on old unit and used as guide to wire the new one. Even used same mounting screws as old one. Connected to Wi-Fi no problem, added a few details about our location and was up and running in under 30 minutes. Hint: set the time and schedule for the hottest/dryest month and activate the automatic adjust feature for weather and seasons. We live in Vegas so no problem setting up in July for hottest/dryest. The controller takes over and no problems. Will send all kinds of messages including completion of cycles, errors, schedule changes etc.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: I picked this up because I travel a lot and ...
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up because I travel a lot and wanted to be able to turn on-off my sprinklers from afar. The app takes a long time to load and it reloads after you change a setting or conduct an action in the app. The wifi is unreliable. The app fails to connect to the controller 25-30% of the time. It sometimes requires you to reboot or reset to factory the controller in order to have it reconnect to your router.
customer_reviews.author: Thorman

customer_reviews.title: Failure to communicate
customer_reviews.text: I bought the controller last July (2017) and it worked great out of the box. Easy to install and program. This year so far the phone app continues to lose its ability to communicate with the controller. I have uninstalled, and reinstalled the app several times (including with the help of Rain Bird tech support). After a reinstall it seems like it is working, but later you invariably get a communication error message which requires a reinstall. My router is within 30 feet of the box and the wifi signal at the box is strong. I think the plug in module must be bad. In any event I am ready to return the product for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: System failed
customer_reviews.text: 2 years in the wifi receiver stopped working, reset the entire thing, still nothing, the app is by far the biggest flaw with this too, replaced it with the b-hyve, works great and won't be turning back
customer_reviews.author: colin reekie

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I could never get mine to setup with the app on my phone. My phone could connect to the Rain Bird WiFi but the app could not find the unit. Rain Bird Technical support had me try many things but it wouldn't work. They even had me take it to a local dealer to replace the WiFi module but it still didn't work. Technical Support said they would contact me to let me know what to do next, but they never did. I returned it to Amazon and was afraid to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Won't connect to my wireless network. Full bars on ...
customer_reviews.text: Won't connect to my wireless network. Full bars on the phone. Hotspot mode only works if I'm within a couple of feet of the unit even though the phone shows full bars on the signal from inside another building. App won't let me enter the zip code. Constant connection errors even though other devices have no issues in the same spot. I tested this. Tech support is only open during the hours I'm at work. Can't get help. So this is a hundred dollar lesson on what not to buy on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Did not work consistently!
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied as it would not work consistently with the Wi-Fi. Found that it would notify me that it completed a watering cycle when indeed it did not. Had too many problems with it disconnecting from my Wi-Fi when my router was only 5 feet from the control box. I returned the item to Amazon as it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Friendly one

customer_reviews.title: Physically defective unit received!
customer_reviews.text: When installing the unit it did not work. After openingen the unit the unit was burned black at the AC 24v connectors. Also I don't think the display works 'wireless' (see photo's). I urge Amazon to express ship me a new one and also complete, thus including the WIFI module. When I don't receive a NEW, working and complete unit I will request a full refund at AMEX including a formal complaint. If Amazon wants a return, you can give me a free shipping label from eg UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jeroen

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: WiFi module was defective. Never could get network to appear on the smartphone app. Rainbird customer service advised to go to local distributor, and they would replace it. Distributor refused to do so since it was not purchased through them. Returning product.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use interface on the mobile app
customer_reviews.text: Just got and I am not a handy guy. I had it hooked up and on the internet in under an hour. Great easy to use interface on the mobile app. I was hesitant because it was a good bit cheaper than the most popular controller. Very pleased with the ease of set up and nice features.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bad

customer_reviews.title: Cannot predict rain!
customer_reviews.text: This device description gives you the impression it can predict rain and you can avoid the cost of a rain sensor. Wrong! It can predict rain and now I have to go through the hassle of returning it. The company prices the product low knowing that you will ultimately have to pay another $80 or so for a rain sensor from them. The software is not useful. No way to turn the irrigation off. Can only set time in 10-minute increments. You cannot set a program that goes through all zones. Shockingly bad design for a company with a brand like Rainbird.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: A good system, however a few drawbacks. The manual interface is very counter intuitive; also the app is very slow to fetch the details on your controller and won't work over the internet (unless perhaps you set up a VPN). Also when setting a manual watering on something like an iPhone, the time slider is very sensitive and it won't just let you type the number of minutes in.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not good if you have an Android device
customer_reviews.text: When purchased in 2017, everything worked as advertised, as I was using an iPhone. I moved to an Android phone later that year (Pixel 2), and have had grief ever since. The only way to get it to connect to the Android is to borrow an iOS device, and reset Rain Bird. Then, and only for a few weeks, will the Android device connect to the Rain Bird. Once it stops connecting, I have to repeat the steps of resetting Rain Bird's wifi and reconfiguring using an iOS device. If you're world is all Apples, then this product will work for you. If not, try at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kucala

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well. I have 4 zone and it supports up to 8. I really like that I can update everything using my cell phone and find out the latest status, etc. I can change schedules, tell it to water now and have it linked to the current weather. No real issues. Only negative is that when you're initially connecting, it takes 5-10 seconds to go through a connection process where it pulls all of the current information from the rain bird. A little annoying but I'm only doing once in a while so not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: doesn't wok well
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product... if fact I would return it if the time has not passed. The wifi keeps going off and you can not run the zones manually except one at a time, you have to keep going back and turning it off then on again...when it it working which is not often.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smart controller
customer_reviews.text: This Rain Bird Wi-Fi sprinkler controller works well. I was able to install it (replacing an older controller) in about 15 minutes. Connecting to my Wi-Fi was easy. The controller gets weather updates at 1:00 AM every night and adjusts the time on each zone accordingly. I also added a rain sensor which works very well shutting off watering when it has rained. The iOS app works well, though I hope RainBird keeps updating and modernizing it. Overall, I am very satisfied with this controller.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Best controller I have every used!  Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller. Programming it was very easy and straight forward through the rain bird app. It is nice to be able to adjust it or cancel watering when I am away from home. The controller is connected to the internet and will adjust watering as well based on the seasons. I don't have it, but there is an option to connect a rain sensor to modify the watering schedule automatically.
customer_reviews.author: 727 Driver

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and program. It connected to my WiFi and my phone immediately, without any issues. I programmed the controller through the app in my phone in less than 10 minutes, including naming zones and taking pictures for each zone. I guess the bad reviews are all related to the strength of one’s WiFi network. If you have a good signal, you will have no problems. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JRH

customer_reviews.title: Good Gizmo
customer_reviews.text: Life changer. It was a relatively quick install. The operation manual is only on line which is kind of drag. We have had no issues after using this for a couple of weeks. Support at RainBird was great. I had trouble figuring out how to set up zones to run consecutively. They answered the question quickly and did not leave me on hold for an unreasonable amount of time while waiting for tech support.
customer_reviews.author: mtntop pop

customer_reviews.title: Great Wi-Fi sprinkler solution
customer_reviews.text: Controlling my sprinkler remotely was the goal and this fits the bill perfectly. I was very impressed with how easy this was to install. The app was great and walked me through the process step by step. However, I do have a relatively weak Wi-Fi signal (77) per the app but it still works just fine. Wires were easy to attach. My old rain bird is 15 years old and no Wi-Fi so this is a great upgrade. Entire install was about 45 minutes so I am please.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great WiFi sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Prettt good unit. Wish the app was a little more intuitive. Some of the weather adjustment is tricky to understand. Mine lost WiFi connection and because I water early it took a long time to realize the sprinklers weren’t running. Wish they had some kind of alarm or notification that unti lost WiFi. Also really wish you could save a few routines, like a quick system watering after I mow the lawn. I’d still recommend this unit over about any others I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: CKoenig

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: Worked! Like most of this wifi stuff, it takes a little work to get it up and running. But Rainbird has some great videos on how to connect this to wifi and set it up. So far, works great. I also like that it can be completely controlled manually at the box if need be. Recommend checking out the video on how to connect this to Alexa. Little confusing for me, but got it.
customer_reviews.author: DON SILVERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Intial app connectivity is a bit slow, everything else is great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and set up. I've never used the controller to program, only programmed via the Rainbird app. The app is easy to use though slow to initially communicate to the controller and loses connection with the controller if you exit the app or open a second app and return to it. Doesn't run in the background. Additionally within the app, manual watering is tedious as you can only slide a bar to set the time and it's hard to slide to the exact desired time. Overall, having the ability to connect to the controller wirelessly on my smart phone is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: so good. Seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Seems very well made. Simple to install in my garage. Had a problem setting up the WiFi. Called the Rain Bird help line, received excellent service. Walked me through the initial WiFi setup. Putting in a new irrigation system for entire yard. Will report back after my new yard and new system is complete. At this point, very happy. A real value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, but after a month or so, I ran into inexplicable WiFi issues that prevent me from being able to control the device from the mobile app (which is the purpose of this particular model). I haven’t had any problems with connecting other wireless devices in that area of my house (e.g., cameras and light bulbs. Tried to troubleshoot it myself but ended up running it manually last season. Will try Tech Support this season.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This controller is a good value
customer_reviews.text: After two months of use, the unit is still operating flawlessly, and every time I have accessed it via my phone to make changes to the program it has worked properly as well. I'm very happy with this controller.
customer_reviews.author: tommytrekr

customer_reviews.title: is secure and easy to install on multiple devices (Something I hadn't checked ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, is secure and easy to install on multiple devices (Something I hadn't checked out) which was cool. Works great on Edge plus and Iphone 6+
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine - lots of features.
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand some of the negative reviews. This timer was simple and easy to install, and setup with the app is straight forward. As indicated in the instructions, you need reasonable wifi reception for its location (ours is just 2 bars but works fine). There are an abundance of features and options to program by zone. My only complaint might be the lag time when the app is opened, as downloads information each time from the timer, but I guess it's only about 5 seconds out of one's life.
customer_reviews.author: Don J.

customer_reviews.title: Got it installed very quickly and so far works great. The software is slow and a little quirky
customer_reviews.text: Got it installed very quickly and so far works great. The software is slow and a little quirky. Wish there was a history of what was watered. I have them set for early in the morning, so would like confirmation that they ran. Did like the ability to do manual watering when I missed one of the zones in setting up the schedule. Do like how easy the software is to use. Overall pretty satisfied, but have only had it 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Piotrowski

customer_reviews.title: the Wi-Fi part is very nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Works well, the Wi-Fi part is very nice to have. Only reason i gave it 4 stars is that the App / Controller lags quite a bit. have to wait about 20-30 seconds after each schedule change. When you have 8 zones going 5 times a day it can take a half hour or so to change all settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Setup and operation seem to be pretty straight forward, which is good because the documentation sucks. I'm giving this product 2 stars because the sharing feature, which is why I bought this device, is difficult to impossible to implement. I have yet to be able to set up the sharing and the customer service rep I just talked to provided very little help. I am not giving up yet, but I am unlikely to buy a Rain Bird associated "smart" product again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Perry

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and program
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and program. Programming instructions could have been a little more clear, but I figured out how to do it pretty quickly. I'm a homeowner and not a professional landscaper. Controller worked fine for about 5 weeks and then I could no longer control zones and ultimately, it quick working in any zone. Since I was away, the yard dried up and had to replace the controller!!!!
customer_reviews.author: William M Robson

customer_reviews.title: Works well.  Able to program/monitor my sprinkler form anywhere.  Set up was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Interface is very simple. Was able to connect up to our wifi network within about 10 minutes. Now able to control our sprinklers from anywhere. The app that goes with this is fine, although a bit light on features. Still, it works well. No need to walk t the box anymore. It's all on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Weak WiFi module/now non working WiFi module
customer_reviews.text: Keeps going offline I have perfect WiFi signal at controller but it connects to WiFi when it feels like it. Total piece of trash. Now doesn’t connect to WiFi at all unless your standing next to it. WiFi module? Junk should have chose better dongle for it
customer_reviews.author: HAMMER

customer_reviews.title: Good Upgrade For the older Rain Bird Controllers
customer_reviews.text: This works just great. We replaced our non-WIFI Rain Bird controller with this and it is very nice. We particularly like how it automatically adjusts for the weather forecast so it maintains the lawn nicely but also conserves water. We have been using it through the heat of the summer and so far so good. Also the installation was very easy and tool only 10 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Update review: I have 2 of these, the outdoor & indoor models. Work nice the majority of the time but they do have many communication errors. The errors solve themselves sometimes or a quick hard disconnect also does the trick. I’m not sure I would recommend this WiFi controller. It makes gardening life easier & convenient however it sure errors out a lot. I will start looking For a different WiFi controller to test. I’ll update here.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: RAINBIRD ST8-WIFI stop working after a week
customer_reviews.text: Great product when it works. But the Hot spot function stopped working after a week. No light at all, no green or no red. Reset the unit several times. Finally I called Rainbird Customer Svc. "You probably got a refurbished unit" said the Rainbird Tech. I paid for a brand new I explained. Would not recommend this timer BECAUSE of the bad customer service. I still believe ST8-WIFI is a nice product WHEN it works. They were not interested to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: CARL I PERSTAD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I updated our ancient original rain bird (wheels, buttons and dials) to this fantastic easy to use product. TAKE A PICTURE OF YOUR CURRENT WIRING DIAGRAM! It says so in the instructions but, being a man, I knew I could figure it out on my own. I did, eventually but the picture would have made the installation quicker. The range for the wifi is great! The iphone app is easy to use and I had it programmed within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Lots of flexibility and control in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I just reseeded my lawn, and I see the true super power of this unit! From my cell, I was able to set 6x short sprinkler times to ensure the seeds stay wet. When it rained, with 1 click, I could skip its programming for that day. Only thing I would improve is removing the 6 cycles limit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Ever

customer_reviews.title: It is a mess. connect to wifi but is not able to work on app
customer_reviews.text: I bought it but it is a mess. It connects to wifi but when when you try to access it through the app, it tries to connect, to do a lot of process but ti never finishes, so you cannot actually access it through the app. I bought it to access it via the app! And this and my former 20 years old rain bird is the same. Unfortunately I bought it and installed it several months after so i cannot return it. Ramiro Ayala
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected. Love the phone app so that I can control most of the functions thru my android phone. It seems not everything can be done thru the app. Can't remember if it was the date/time that had to be set on the actual unit. Easy to install. Love that it is weather resistant so I didn't need to purchase a separate cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: ScullyRose

customer_reviews.title: This was an excellent replacement for a still functional but difficult to use ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent replacement for a still functional but difficult to use irrigation control unit. The previous unit was a Irrigtrol brand or something like that. Seemed to have good ratings but I thought it was complex to program. This unit is s breeze to program. Works great. Everyone can use their iPhone to check the schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchase another brand
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the product for a little over a year now. Over that time it has saved me a lot of effort in watering my lawns. However the app is poorly designed and its functionality is lackluster at best. If you choose to buy this, you will no doubt have much frustration attempting to water your lawn manually through the app. God help you if you change your Wi-Fi router. If you do it's unlikely you will be able to connect to a new router. The bottom line is that this product is poorly conceived, the app is poorly conceived, and it is utter junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Use
customer_reviews.text: Although this controller offers more flexibility than my old one did, I find it hard to use. My primary objection is that when trying to access the controller through the iPhone app I have to try repeatedly before a connection is finally made. Also the Q&A information available online concerns only the basic operations. There is nothing to help with more complex operations, either through the app or on the controller's face.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great hub but the app is a bit finicky
customer_reviews.text: The hub is easy to instal and a great upgrade for an existing system. It works with WiFi, which is very helpful, as it can be accessed anywhere in the world. Sometimes, however, the app just loses connection with the hub and it doesn’t sync right. Not a big deal, just restart the app
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor WiFi controler
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this controler it worked for about 18 months then the WiFi kept dropping. Without WiFi the programming is nearly impossible. I followed the manual and hired a tech to see why it kept dropping the WiFi signal after 18 months of working its clearly an inferior product and I need to replace it with a more reliable controller. I reached out to rainbird but never talked to a live tech there
customer_reviews.author: wayne61

customer_reviews.title: definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this. I reviewed the video prior to purchasing and it was very easy to install. It didn't take long to install and didn't run into any problems. I like the app too. The ease of changing your schedules, and adjusting it manually at your finger tips. I read reviews how others stated they couldn't or had problems. Never ran into it. In fact I purchased a 2nd one for my family member.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great wifi controller
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had upgraded to this controller sooner. The iphone app interface makes it very easy to set and change your watering schedule, and you can make the changes anywhere you have an internet connection. The app is user friendly and has an intuitive interface. I especially like the app feature that allows you to send your settings via email to your ipad or other mobile device..
customer_reviews.author: Henry White

customer_reviews.title: Barely does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with this purchase. Setup was a challenge as it would not initially connect to my WiFi. Programming is very limited. You can only program one program per zone. The multiple start times is the only variation you have for the zone but the problem is the duration is the same for all start times. The weather input is pretty much only for the US. Remote operation does work but it has to download the whole schedule and settings before you can interact with it. Rather save up so that you can afford and buy the Rachio. Rachio uses international weather services and programs are more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great the app needs improving
customer_reviews.text: The controller works great. Easy to install, worked the first time. WiFi range is excellent. The only reason I gave it only four stars is because of the poor Ui (user interface) in the app. It has exllent features and works well but its not very intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: AWV

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to replace with my old mechanical rain bird ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed. Super easy to replace with my old mechanical rain bird water timer. Easy set up, easy app to use. Super easy, I can water my yard from anywhere any time. As long as I have cell coverage or internet. Very Cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Saving Water and Money
customer_reviews.text: My husband set it up for me and I couldn't be more delighted. I can control the irrigation system using my cell phone from ANYWHERE, anytime. It was simple to figure out how to add a photo of each zone to the app, reminding me which zone is which. As a gardener, it gives me total control of supplemental watering, keeping my lawn separate from my beds and saving me lots of water and money. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith B.

customer_reviews.title: It was extremely easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is the BOMB! It was extremely easy to set up, great instructions and very intuitive. The iPhone APP is a little quirky and crashes at inopportune times (like when you manually run a zone to find a leak...and you FIND A LEAK and need to turn the zone off post haste!). I'm hoping that they will be able to work through the bugs. But using the app to program the zones...VERY easy. And being able to change programming from anywhere I have internet access....OH YEAH. Way cool.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Payne

customer_reviews.title: Affordable/Powerful Wifi enabled sprinkler controller!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and works good. Took about 20 minutes to wire and setup. The app is very intuitive and is PACKED with features. 4.5/5 stars for the app. This product has three gotchas 1. You need to have good 2.4ghz wifi access where you are installing this unit. 2. The app does not have a very fast menu. 3. No alexa support (I did not want that feature.)
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great System
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is great. The WiFi is difficult to keep connected even with only one wall for the signal to travel through from the router when other mobile devices do not struggle. The app is easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: jrwn90

customer_reviews.title: Great controller just don’t rely on the app to be the only way to manage it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome controller. Love that I can manually turn on the heads from an app on my phone while I’m replacing the heads throughout the yard. Only thing I don’t like is the app loses connection to the controller ALOT. It’s not my network or phone. I’ve tried running on cellular instead of WiFi on my phone and same problem. Phone connects to everything else just fine so it’s the app to the controller. Other than that, I really like this controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this controller 6 months and have had several issues with it. Our Lawn company’s Sprinkler man has tried to work with it also and it simply won’t stay connected to WiFi to complete a cycle. Amazons window to return it closed after only one month. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Hegeman

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews that you cannot run the sprinklers from your smart phone manually
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that you cannot run the sprinklers from your smart phone manually. I found this not to be the case, i can operate my sprinklers manually and I can override the timers. This is a very good unit and easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Saldana

customer_reviews.title: The controller installation and wifi setup were easy. The app leaves a bit to be desired ...
customer_reviews.text: The controller installation and wifi setup were easy. The app leaves a bit to be desired (little things like a countdown timer when running a zone would be helpful). Also the app has locked up a couple of times and had to be deleted and reinstalled to make it work. Also, there is no apparent way to turn a zone off from the app once it has started its programmed cycle (could be a problem in an emergency). Overall, though, it's a lot more convenient to make changes, etc., via wifi, rather than outside at the controller, but the software could be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wifi not so good
customer_reviews.text: Well after having this for more than a year I gave up on it. Bottom line - the wifi connectivity is terrible. The unit never maintained a consistent connection. I had to constantly go back to the wifi dongle and start the enrollment process all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morin

customer_reviews.title: Great way to set up and change watering needs from a cell phone.
customer_reviews.text: Works just great. Very convenient, also, for adjusting sprinkler heads, etc., without having to run back and forth to a timer to shut it off and on. Easy and intuitive cell phone app that even allows pictures to be uploaded for each zone in case you forget which zone is which.Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Phone App isn't great but otherwise, great
customer_reviews.text: Could be 5 star if the phone app was more user friendly. Don't get me wrong, it's fine... it just could be better. I also haven't found the feature that lets me repeat the cycle (good for water absorption)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.....
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this was discontinued, I’ve had this unit for a couple years now and it works fantastically. Easy to install, set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: VKSheridan

customer_reviews.title: Great WiFi connection makes watering more convenient and water saving, which is a big deal in California.
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed following direction and watching video first. Replaced older model. Really like that I can control from the iPhone, which allowed me to test my drip fixes without having to run to the garage to start and stop.
customer_reviews.author: ComfortPriority

customer_reviews.title: Will not work on my whole house wifi
customer_reviews.text: I have two different wireless routers in my house. One from the cable company and a TP-links deco (that I use for everything in my house), which is a whole house wifi router. I could not get it to work with my TP-link, but it worked fine when I switch it to my cable router.
customer_reviews.author: James Osbourne

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Horrible on Android.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. My only complaint which made it lose a star is it is terrible with Android. Could not configure it on my phone. I had to use my iPad. I am sure a future software update will fix these issues.
customer_reviews.author: WhereRMyDragons

customer_reviews.title: Great system, if you are tech savvy.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! If you have a modern wifi router, make sure when you hook this system up, it's on the 2.4 ghz channel. You can link up to the system and manage it when directly connected to its hotspot, but once you are done it won't stay connected to a 5 ghz channel for very long and you won't be able to connect to the system from anywhere in the world. Just be forewarned if it doesn't work quite right. Since every router is different, this may become a challenge to those not tech savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Manny C.

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with Rainbird WiFi controller
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice to control my sprinklers with my phone. If I’m away from home (out of town) I can control with my phone. So far I’ve had it for a couple of months and I’m very pleased with the Rainbird WiFi system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain Bird Controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller lets me control every aspect of my sprinkler system from my iPhone. Price was good. Delivery was very fast. Setup and WiFi connection was much easier that I expected. I highly recommend this controller.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Neelley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I dont understand the bad reviews for this timer. I have it in the garage and the Wi-Fi from the living room works just fine. The app. Is easy to use and hasn't stopped once. The install was just like any other and it did come with the wifi adapter. I recomend this to anyone looking for a good wifi timer.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This was my second attempt at getting a wireless WiFi control sprinkler controller. It works fantastic. I didn't get it programmed properly until I watched a Youtube video that gave me tips in programming. I'm very well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Fred

customer_reviews.title: Limited Use
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this item was to use my Samsung Note 9 with the unit but up till now I still haven't connected it to my Samsung. It connect with Mac Ipad but I have a Samsung mobile and so far useless.
customer_reviews.author: dbigman12

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement and good Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, easy install and Wifi setup in less than 5 minutes. Slight confusion during install where connect to the device as an AccessPoint, configure the Wifi to connect to home network. The mobile app then looses connection. To resolve, just connect to your home network and the RainBird is then available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well, many options for timing and watering intervals. Takes little time to learn it cause the instructions are very poor but ince you do that it’s great and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matemk

customer_reviews.title: Rainbird denies product defective
customer_reviews.text: Wifi controller does not work. Contacted Rainbird after several attempts to install wifi controller. Rainbird says I am not getting good smarting signal. But my ping upload and download test revealed I have HIGH parameters on all three.Called my carrier and they checked wifi, all good strong system. Called Rainbird and again said not their problem after I said their product was defective. I have no other choice but to put the credit card charge under dispute.
customer_reviews.author: Wallace C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great signal on the wifi
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this unit for a few months and so far I've had no problems. It replaced the standard controller the house came with and was simple to install. The UI on the app is great and I love being able to control the schedule when I'm away.
customer_reviews.author: LM_ATX

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this upgraded system. I can control the system with my smartphone from anywhere. It's easy to use, very logical app, and was easy to swap out our old system with this one.
customer_reviews.author: kayw

customer_reviews.title: Great Wifi Controller
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very easy to purge the sprinkler for winter using the phone app. No need to open and close valves. Really easy to program and you can have multiple sprinkler times during a day if required. Really helped me when the new sod was laid down.
customer_reviews.author: Almostthere

customer_reviews.title: Awesome WiFi controller
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinkler controller. Arrived quickly. Easy instructions and installation. WiFi works great. Saving 20% on water bill already
customer_reviews.author: MooneyPilot

customer_reviews.title: Gotcha now, JUNK letter carrier !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dependable, the right price and Wi-Fi !! It also pairs beautifully with Rain Birds app which is loaded with features. It's a "gotta have it" product.
customer_reviews.author: Wrench

customer_reviews.title: The controller works great. Love being able to control the system from ...
customer_reviews.text: The controller works great. Love being able to control the system from my phone. So nice to be able to run the system after making adjustments to heads without running back to the controller. My only complaint is there is no way to “water all now” from the phone. You have go back to the manual controls to do that. Other than that I have been very happy with the unit. Even able to water the lawn from another state.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Orewiler

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to hook up and connect to internet
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to hook up and connect to internet. Only problem I have is remotely you have to run each zone individually in stead of running a specific program which may contain multiple zones.
customer_reviews.author: MikeACY

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I had to move it closer to my router for a stronger signal and it's awesome. Easy to install and to use the app. It's cool controlling my sprinklers by my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert in accounting

customer_reviews.title: Good unit easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: set up was easy.. wireless works fine and was not to bad to setup. Wish it had an online app instead of just a phone app. Like that you do NOT have to have internet to make this unit work. Can set manually.
customer_reviews.author: flag holder

customer_reviews.title: Good Smart Sprinkler Controller.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to upgrade my wired Rain Bird sprinkler controllers to a smart controller. This controller was easy to install and setup. I think it only took about 10/15 minutes to install and connect to my home network. Only issue is testing or running zones when they are not on a schedule. Each zone has to be tested or run separately. Only for that reason I couldn't give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dontonio Thompson`

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this so I can operate while I'm in the house and away from the house. My other controller was not wifi and located outside. I like this because if it starts raining, I no longer have to go out in the rain to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: MotorCity248

customer_reviews.title: This Rain Bird ST8O-WIFI was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This Rain Bird ST8O-WIFI was easy to install. I had the old Rain Bird and this one fit in great! But remember to take a picture of your old wiring and it'll be a breeze to install. Easy to us with my IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a month now. Easy to connect to WiFi, and I like that it has the non cloud option. Makes things so easy to set up and control. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Micah (SoCal)

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I used to forget to turn it off ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I used to forget to turn it off when i rained since the wireless rain gauge broke. This does it all for me with our me having to remember. I also got the rain sensor.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best controllers you can ever use simple to the point auto updates time and date once you connected to Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.author: m j qashu

customer_reviews.title: Is it perfect? No
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I hoped it would do. Is it perfect? No; the app does seem very slow, and other reviewers have commented on some of the other quirks. However, the basic functionality is there and works just fine. I did not give it five stars because Rain Bird advertises that the controller can be managed from "mobile devices" when the truth is the "mobile devices" are just two different flavors of smartphones. This is a pet peeve of mine: "mobile devices" includes smartphones, but also tablets, iPads, and even laptops. If you don't have apps for all mobile devices, don't advertise that you do. Just say works with Apple and Android phones.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon10

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient to be able to operate my sprinklers from ...
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient to be able to operate my sprinklers from the sprinkler head instead of having to run back to the old slide-switch controller.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I needed to work on the sprinkles and could turn the water on and off as I worked on the heads without having to move from yard. The app is very quick to respond, takes only seconds when you tell it to stop or run.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Belle

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Need to turn on the sprinklers? Set a schedule? out of town? No worries! Access straight from your phone. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: aubreyanne

customer_reviews.title: Good but App is sloooow
customer_reviews.text: Good product, plenty of features but the app is so painfully slow that you won’t want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Trogd00r

customer_reviews.title: Great RainBird device.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast and was easy to install. Easy to program with smart phone app. Make sure your WiFi signal strength is good/great for the device to work correctly at the installation location.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this few days, but my first impression is excellent. Replaced a Rainbird CRC-8A very old timer (which worked excellent as well). Installation was very simple, setup to the WIFI was very easy, and programming is a breeze. I do not use a rain sensor so my use is pretty basic. Very happy with this unit so far and am looking forward to many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and program. Has many useful features especially the capability to control the sprinkler when away from my house. I’m completely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Montano

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade from old controller
customer_reviews.text: Really solid controller. Install from legacy controller was pretty simple. The app could be a little smother but overall satisfied with upgrade. Recommend this purchase for handling your irrigation system without having a ridiculous water bill.
customer_reviews.author: Oz W

product_meta.title: Rain Bird ST8I-WIFI 8 Station WiFi Timer, Indoor (Discontinued by Manufacturer; replaced by ST8I-2.0)
product_meta.description:
Size:Obsolete Old Model Indoor 8-StationRain Bird ST8I-WIFI Smart Indoor WiFi Sprinkler/Irrigation System Timer/Controller, WaterSense Certified, 8-Zone/Station. The Rain Bird Smart Irrigation WiFi Timer places control of your sprinkler system in the palm of your hand while saving time, water, and money. EPA WaterSense certified to provide at least a 20% water-savings over non-certified timers. The Rain Bird app allows control of multiple timers located anywhere in the world; install app on multiple devices, or securely share control with family members and landscapers. Compatible with: Amazon Alexa, Apple iOS 8 or greater, and Android 4.4 (KitKat) or later. Connect to timer programming functions via: mobile device through a WiFi network, even away from home; directly from mobile device when in range; or through timer’s front control panel. It’s simple to customize watering schedules which can be automatically adjusted all year. Each watering zone may be set with a different name, picture, frequency, start time, and run time to ensure healthy plants and a lower water bill. Automatic Seasonal Adjust feature will adjust daily watering schedule based on season, local weather, temperature, and humidity. This data automatically downloads for your specific ZIP Code and is calculated every night. Each zone is customizable for Watering Days, Start Times and Run Time: allowing watering on custom days of week, odd or even calendar days, or cyclic (every 1-14 days), 6 Start Times per zone, and Run Times from 0-199 minutes. All timer settings are stored indefinitely in memory; no need to re-program in case of power outage. Enabling Notifications in the Rain Bird app keeps you informed of what’s happening in your yard even when you’re away from home. Know when someone enables a watering delay; Automatic Seasonal Adjust is applied; date or time is incorrect; timer disconnects from WiFi network; valve malfunctions; or of a possible freeze. Watering Delay feature allows you to suspend watering for 1 to 14 days; normal programming resumes automatically once selected delay has ended. Connects to a master valve or pump start relay and supports a wired Rain Sensor to automatically turn timer off when it rains (rain sensor model CPRSDBEX sold separately). Compatible with most 24 VAC irrigation valves. Sealed case protects from moisture, insects and grime; timer designed for use in a weather resistant location like a garage or waterproof shed. Includes transformer with 6’ cord, mounting hardware, and installation guide. Rain Bird “The Intelligent Use of Water”

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Rain Bird Corporation is a privately held company founded in 1933 during the agricultural boom in California. We’re recognized as the #1 manufacturer and provider of irrigation products and services in the world. With sales offices around the globe; we offer over 4,000 water-saving irrigation products in more than 130 countries. Since the very beginning, Rain Bird has produced and offered the industry’s broadest range of high-quality irrigation products for: farms, golf courses, sports arenas, commercial developments and homes. Over the past 80-years Rain Bird has received more than 450 patents worldwide. Including the first one for irrigation in 1935 for our original impact-drive sprinkler (U.S. Patent #1,997,901) which revolutionized agricultural food-production and ushered in a new era in irrigation worldwide. In 1990 this original impact sprinkler was designated a historic landmark by the American Society of Agricultural Engineers. Our products cover all aspects of irrigation…timers/controllers, pop-up rotary sprinklers, pop-up spray head sprinklers, sprinkler nozzles, irrigation valves, Drip irrigation, drainage and much more. These products have all been chosen and installed worldwide in the largest and most prestigious projects for residential, commercial, agricultural and golf course irrigation. Rain Bird is committed to The Intelligent Use of Water™ with our commitment extending beyond products to education, training and services for the industry and the community. Our legacy is to design and manufacture only products of the highest value and quality. We’re grateful to have received numerous recognition awards from many of our valued partners. Rain Bird “The Intelligent Use of Water"
feature_bullets: WiFi signal conveniently places control of your timer in the palm of your hand
Super easy to program; allows access to timer functions from anywhere in the world
Compatible with: Amazon Alexa, Apple iOS 8 or greater, and Android 4.4 (KitKat) or later
Access timer functions via: wireless network, in-range mobile device, or directly through control panel
Daily watering schedule automatically adjusts based on season, local weather, temperature, and humidity
Enabling Notifications in the Rain Bird app will inform on what’s happening in your yard; even when you’re away from home
Watering Delay feature suspends watering from 1 to 14 days; programming resumes automatically once delay has ended

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars382 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
